# Load Packages

Important Variables
- title
- type
- appeared
- number_of_users
- number_of_jobs

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(ggtext)
```

# Load Data

```{r}
data <- read_csv("data/languages.csv")
```

# Pre-processing
```{r}
df <- 
  data %>%
  select(title, type, appeared, number_of_jobs, number_of_users) %>%
  filter(type == 'pl') %>%
  mutate(
    lab1 = 
      glue("<span style=font-size:18pt>**{title} | {appeared}**</span><br><span style=font-size:16pt>{number_of_users}</span>"),
    lab2 =
      glue("<span style=font-size:18pt>**{title} | {appeared}**</span><br><span style=font-size:16pt>{number_of_jobs}</span>"),
    color = case_when(
      title == "R" ~ "dark",
      TRUE ~ "light"
    )
  )
```


# Visualisation
```{r}
df %>%
  arrange(-number_of_users) %>%
  slice_head(n=10) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = number_of_users, y = fct_reorder(title, number_of_users))) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_richtext(aes(label = lab1)
```
